description: Detached single storey outbuilding for use as Gym (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed outbuilding by reason of its excessive scale, together with the absence of any justification for the necessity of the excessive large scale of the outbuilding for the uses proposed, on the balance of probabilities would not be for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. The proposal is therefore contrary to National Planning Policy Framework (2024), Policy SI 12 of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.U of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) Policies DM9 and DM10 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010) and Policy GR1 of the Draft Harrow Local Plan (2021-2041)&nbsp;</p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="">The outbuilding as partially built, does not resemble the submitted proposed plans. Therefore, the local planning authority is unable to fully and accurately assess the retrospective works on site. The proposal is therefore contrary
to the National Planning Policy Framework (2024), Policy D3 D(7) of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Policy DM1 of the Harrow
Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary
Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).<font face="Arial, sans-serif"><o:p></o:p></font></p>

<p class="MsoListParagraph" style="">The
development is located within surface water flood zone 3a and in the absence of
a satisfactory Flood Risk Assessment, it has not been demonstrated that the
proposed development would not exacerbate the risk of flooding within the site
or increase the risk and consequences of flooding elsewhere, contrary to
National Planning Policy Framework (2024), Policy SI 12 of The London Plan
(2021), Core Policy CS1.U of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) Policies DM9 and
DM10 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010) and Policies
GR1 and CN3 of the Draft Harrow Local Plan (2021-2041)&nbsp;</p>
